name: StageAgent.com
tag_list: auditions, casting, broadway, theater, theatre, musicals, plays, opera, actors, singers, dancers
overview:
StageAgent.com, the â€œhome page for community theatreâ€, is a social networking & resource web site for performing artists. We help actors, organizations and fans connect in a fun and friendly online environment.

StageAgent is a primary theatre resource website listing thousands of plot summaries, character descriptions, monologues and audition songs. The site also provides a comprehensive database of open casting calls. Further, StageAgent includes a special tool to assist drama teachers and producers who are looking for the right show to produce. Casting agents can search profiles on StageAgent using criteria such as vocal range, dancing skills and physical features. Finally, the StageAgent PartFinder helps actors learn about the best roles that match their skills.
